summary_md: Belarus, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 6,791 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 5.79% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 3.36% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 74.18 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 91.50% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is at 65.06% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Belarus's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita of 6,791 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an export growth rate of 65.06% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market in Belarus shows an unemployment rate of 3.36% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating a relatively stable employment environment.
sections.digital_md: Internet penetration in Belarus is at 91.50% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), suggesting a moderate level of digital connectivity among its population.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Belarus is 74.18 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), reflecting the country's health environment.

job_seeker: Belarus offers a stable employment environment with an unemployment rate of 3.36% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS) and a GDP per capita of 6,791 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD).
entrepreneur: The moderate level of digital connectivity, indicated by an internet usage rate of 91.50% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), may provide opportunities for entrepreneurs in Belarus.
digital_nomad: With an internet usage rate of 91.50% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), Belarus could be a suitable destination for digital nomads.
expat_family: The stable employment environment and reasonable GDP per capita of 6,791 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) in Belarus might be attractive to expat families.
